amendment.description: Amendment requires candidates to reimburse the government when government equipment is used for campaign-related travel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 8 printed in H.Rept. 106-311 to require reimbursement for the use of government equipment for campaign-related travel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sweeney amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 167 (Roll no. 416).
